mapper.select: SELECT A.fid, A.fname, A.price, A.measurement, A.hasSold, A.introduce, A.img, B.adminName AS createUser, C.adminName AS updateUser FROM food A INNER JOIN admin B ON A.createUser = B.uuid LEFT JOIN admin C ON A.updateuser = C.uuid WHERE A.isdel = 0 AND A.fid = #{fid}
